teachings.title: 10 Reasons It's Better to Have the Holy Spirit ABBB
teachings.description: Andrew Wommack explores Jesus' wisdom on the Holy Spirit's ministry,  guiding deeper understanding and spiritual growth in this teaching.

teachings.title: A Believer or a Disciple?
teachings.description: Discover the difference between being a believer and a true disciple of Jesus. This teaching challenges surface-level Christianity and calls you to a deeper,  life-changing relationship rooted in obedience,  freedom,  and faith in Christ alone. This teaching challenges surface-level Christianity and calls you to a deeper, life-changing relationship rooted in obedience, freedom, and faith in Christ alone.

teachings.title: A Better Way to Pray
teachings.description: Want to absolutely transform your prayer life? Get a fresh perspective on God's love and learn how to pray from a place of authority!

teachings.title: A Call to Prayer
teachings.description: Are you praying effectively? Powerful prayers are essential to turning America back to God. Find out how to pray for your nation!

teachings.title: A Christian Perspective on War
teachings.description: Andrew speaks about important scriptural concepts related to defending oneself and waging war.

teachings.title: A Place Called "There"
teachings.description: Experience the story of Elijah like never before! Find your place called there

teachings.title: Anger Management
teachings.description: Want to know why you're so angry? There's godly and ungodly anger. Uncover the difference between the two and find real peace and restoration!

teachings.title: Are You Satisfied With Jesus
teachings.description: Learn to connect with God beyond the senses. Discover the key to joy and peace by approaching Him in spirit and truth.

teachings.title: As I Have Loved You
teachings.description: Discover the power of unconditional love in this teaching on Jesus' final commandment to His disciples. Transform your relationships for the better today!

teachings.title: Believer's Authority
teachings.description: Ready to start living the victorious Christian life? Uncover the spiritual battles at play in your life and learn to wield your God-given authority!

teachings.title: Biblical Worldview
teachings.description: Biblical Worldview: Embrace God's Word as your foundation,  not popular culture. Andrew Wommack explores vital truths for a Christian worldview.

teachings.title: Blessings and Miracles
teachings.description: Did you know it's better to live in God's blessings than to constantly need miracles? Find out how you can go from miracles to blessings today!

teachings.title: Choose Life!
teachings.description: Learn to integrate your faith fully,  ensuring the Bible influences every aspect of your life as a true Christian.

teachings.title: Christian First Aid Kit
teachings.description: Facing a crisis? Preventing a troubled heart can bring peace and strength in every situation. Find out how!

teachings.title: Christian Philosophy
teachings.description: Does your way of thinking align with God's? What does the Bible say about major issues? Find out and protect yourself from deception!

teachings.title: Christians and Politics
teachings.description: The Gospel has the power to transform an entire nation. Discover the importance of boldly sharing the good news of Jesus Christ within your sphere of influence!

teachings.title: Christians: Citizens and Disciples
teachings.description: Learn how you can change lives through true discipleship and help transform nations with God's love!

teachings.title: Dealing with Temptation
teachings.description: Confronting temptation? God's Word and embracing your identity in Christ can lead to victory over temptation and sin. Find out how!

teachings.title: Decisions Determine Destiny
teachings.description: Every decision you make is moving you closer to or further away from your God-ordained destiny. Make confident godly decisions that propel you toward your destiny!

teachings.title: Discipleship Evangelism
teachings.description: Discover why only 15% of believers continue in faith. Learn the difference between conversion and lifelong discipleship.

teachings.title: Discipleship Versus Evangelism
teachings.description: Discover what salvation is and the difference between conversion and discipleship. Learn how to easily disciple your friends and neighbors!

teachings.title: Discipleship: The Path to Freedom
teachings.description: Discover how to become a disciple,  abide in the Word,  and triumph through hardship.

teachings.title: Discover the Keys to Staying Full of God
teachings.description: Discover how to maintain a deep,  lasting relationship with God?not just for a moment,  but for a lifetime. Learn the four keys to staying full of His love and presence every day.

teachings.title: Don't Limit God
teachings.description: The way you see God and yourself might be limiting what He can do in your life. Change the way you think and take the limits off God today!

teachings.title: Don't Limit God?23rd Anniversary
teachings.description: Celebrate 25 years of transformative ministry with insights on overcoming small thinking and embracing God's limitless plans. Discover how trusting Him can unlock your greatest potential.

teachings.title: Dwelling in God's Presence
teachings.description: Discover how abiding in God's presence unlocks His promises. Learn from Andrew the importance of consistent connection for victorious living.

teachings.title: Effective Prayer
teachings.description: Hypocrites love to pray. There are right and wrong ways to pray.

teachings.title: Effects of Praise
teachings.description: Discover how praise affects you,  God,  and the devil. Increase your faith,  overcome challenges,  and experience joy through the power of praise!

teachings.title: Effortless Change
teachings.description: Is it possible to experience God's abundant life effortlessly? Let go of the striving and struggling and learn how God's Word can transform your life beyond your expectations.

teachings.title: Eternal Life: There's More to It Than You Think
teachings.description: The secret to true eternal life is a personal,  intimate relationship with God. Don't wait till you get to heaven to start experiencing eternal life!

teachings.title: Excellence: How to Pursue an Excellent Spirit
teachings.description: God desires to promote you,  but you determine if you're promoted. You must choose to have an excellent spirit.

teachings.title: Faith Builders
teachings.description: Faith is essential for pleasing God and overcoming the world. Discover its vital role in your Christian life.

teachings.title: Faith for Healing Is Based on Knowledge
teachings.description: Ready to walk in your authority in Christ and experience God's healing power? Learn how!

teachings.title: Faith Is Based on Knowledge
teachings.description: Your success hinges on you knowing God's precious promises. Be rooted and grounded in the knowledge of God and watch your faith work effortlessly!

teachings.title: Faith of God
teachings.description: How do you unleash God's supernatural power within you and start overcoming challenges with confidence? Find out how!

teachings.title: Faith,  Love,  and War
teachings.description: Learn from Andrew Wommack,  Duane Sheriff,  and Bob Yandian on how Christians should respond to America's increasing ungodliness.

teachings.title: Financial Stewardship
teachings.description: Your attitude toward finances can lead to prosperity. Embrace stewardship,  sow generously,  and trust in God's provision. Develop the mindset of a steward today!

teachings.title: Financial Stewardship: The Practical Side
teachings.description: Did you know there are both spiritual and practical aspects to financial stewardship? Discover the steps you can take to experience true prosperity today!

teachings.title: Four Basics of Hearing God's Voice
teachings.description: Learn to hear God's voice for guidance and victory in life. Andrew shares four principles to tune into God effectively.

teachings.title: Four Essential Elements of Christian Maturity
teachings.description: Andrew Wommack teaches spiritual growth and faith for abundant living?knowledge and truth leading to freedom in Christ.

teachings.title: Galatians
teachings.description: Experience the liberating message of grace found in Galatians. Gain new insights and live free from condemnation!

teachings.title: Galatians,  Ephesians,  Philippians,  and Colossians
teachings.description: Explore the teachings of the Apostle Paul on God's unconditional love and grace. Uncover God's love for you and deepen your relationship with Him!

teachings.title: Getting Along with People
teachings.description: Receiving God's love and sharing it with others unlocks the doors to healing,  deliverance,  and prosperity. Discover abundance and joy in your relationships!

teachings.title: God and Country
teachings.description: What is America's true Christian heritage,  and why is it crucial to maintain an attitude of gratitude? Find out now!

teachings.title: God Wants You to Succeed
teachings.description: Redefine success through God's eyes,  walk in victory,  and follow His unique plan for your life. Walk in success daily!

teachings.title: God Wants You Well
teachings.description: How do you tap into God's healing power to transform your physical,  mental,  and emotional health? Find out now!

teachings.title: God's Kind of Love
teachings.description: Experience the transformative power of God's unconditional love,  a revelation that will change your life forever. Receive His love and give it freely!

teachings.title: God's Kind of Love in Marriage
teachings.description: Missing the joy in your marriage? Transform your relationship with God's unconditional love and rediscover the joy and fulfillment in your marriage.

teachings.title: God's Kind of Love Through You
teachings.description: Understand God's love and let it flow through you. This series clears up misconceptions and guides you on how to do it.

teachings.title: God's Kind of Love to You
teachings.description: Discover God's unconditional love beyond your behavior. Settle the issue of His constant love for you today.

teachings.title: God's Man,  Plan,  and Timing
teachings.description: Discover how Moses was prepared for God's purpose in the Bible. Learn lessons on being usable for God.

teachings.title: God's Word - the Seed of His Blessing
teachings.description: God's Word is the life-changing seed of power for the victorious Christian life. Experience the power found in the Bible today!

teachings.title: Gospel of Peace
teachings.description: What is the good news of the Gospel? Find out now and discover the life-changing power of God's unconditional love and grace like never before!

teachings.title: Grace and Faith in Giving
teachings.description: Learn to trust God with your finances. Discover biblical insights that will transform your approach to giving.

teachings.title: Grace: The Power of the Gospel
teachings.description: In the book of Romans,  Paul gives an in-depth explanation of the Gospel of grace and faith. Unlock the power of the Gospel and be set free from legalism today!

teachings.title: Great Awakening
teachings.description: Explore Andrew Wommack's revelation about the Third Great Awakening. Discover how revival is already in progress despite worldly challenges.

teachings.title: Hardness of Heart
teachings.description: Explore the Hardness of Heart series: understand the crisis,  cause,  and cure for a heart unresponsive to God.

teachings.title: Harnessing Your Emotions
teachings.description: Your life boils down to the way you think (Prov. 23:7). Renew your mind and transform your life!

teachings.title: Healing & Niki's Miracle
teachings.description: Uncover the truth about divine healing and experience God's miraculous power for yourself. Check out Niki's testimony!

teachings.title: Healing is the Children's Bread
teachings.description: How do you receive healing through faith? Find out how God's healing power works!

teachings.title: Healing Truth and Testimonies
teachings.description: God's desire is for you to live whole and healed.

teachings.title: Hebrews Highlights: What Do You Believe?
teachings.description: A New Covenant relationship with God is one where you can boldly approach Him and live free from sin-consciousness. Find out how!

teachings.title: Hebrews: Living in the New Covenant Reality
teachings.description: Are you missing out on true freedom? Andrew Wommack's Hebrews: Living in the New Covenant Reality can help you understand God's grace so you can start walking with Christ in real victory.

teachings.title: Hell - A Reality or a Metaphor?
teachings.description: Is hell real? And if so,  what does that mean for you? Discover the importance of accepting God's grace through Jesus in this eye-opening teaching!

teachings.title: Holy Spirit
teachings.description: God has an important gift for every born-again believer. Discover the truth behind the baptism of the Holy Spirit!

teachings.title: How to Be Happy
teachings.description: Do you want joy in every circumstance,  like the Apostle Paul had? Discover the keys to true happiness,  contentment,  and joy in this life-changing teaching!

teachings.title: How to Become a Water Walker
teachings.description: Ready to step out of the boat of doubt and walk in God's miraculous power? Find out how to overcome all the storms of life!

teachings.title: How to Find God's Will
teachings.description: You can uncover God's unique plan for your life and step into His perfect will. Find out how!

teachings.title: How to Find,  Follow,  Fulfill God's Will
teachings.description: Uncover how to find,  follow,  and fulfill God's purpose for your life. Learn why you were created with a divine destiny and how actively pursuing His plan leads to true fulfillment.

teachings.title: How to Flow in the Gifts of the Holy Spirit
teachings.description: Tap into the supernatural power of God by learning how to operate in the gifts of the Holy Spirit. Live the authentic,  on-fire Christian life!

teachings.title: How to Follow God's Will
teachings.description: As true disciples of Jesus Christ,  we're called to follow Him,  but how? Discover how you can align yourself with God's will today!

teachings.title: How to Fulfill God's Will
teachings.description: Fulfilling God's will requires focus,  endurance,  and a victorious mindset. Overcome life's hurdles and finish your race with grace!

teachings.title: How to Get Along with People
teachings.description: Learn to overcome envy and strife in relationships with this teaching. Discover effective strategies for resolving conflict and improving connections.

teachings.title: How to Hear God's Voice
teachings.description: Learning to recognize God's voice is where the real adventure begins. Embrace your journey,  hearing Him one day at a time!

teachings.title: How to Overcome Doubt
teachings.description: Overcome your doubts by placing your faith in a surer word of prophecy (2 Pet. 1:19)? God's precious promises. Find out how!

teachings.title: How to Prepare Your Heart
teachings.description: Ready to commit yourself to righteousness and transform your life? Discover how you can prepare your heart to seek the Lord!

teachings.title: How to Reap 100-Fold in a Year of Famine
teachings.description: Discover how to walk in God's supernatural provision. This teaching reveals biblical principles of sowing in faith,  trusting God's Word,  and receiving abundance?even in the midst of famine.

teachings.title: How to Receive a Miracle - Part 1
teachings.description: Discover how to receive a miracle from God through the power of His Word. Plant,  believe,  and receive!

teachings.title: How to Receive a Miracle - Part 2
teachings.description: As a born-again believer,  you already have the faith you need to receive your miracle. Learn how to utilize the faith you've been given in Christ!

teachings.title: How to Receive God's Best
teachings.description: Stop settling for less. Learn to walk in God's blessings instead of always seeking miracles.

teachings.title: How to: Deal with Grief
teachings.description: Feeling stuck in waves of grief? Find comfort,  hope,  and healing in the midst of sorrow with powerful insights and biblical truths on overcoming loss.

teachings.title: Humility: God's Path to More Grace
teachings.description: Explore how God's kingdom differs from the world's system of selfishness and pride,  emphasizing humility and service over self-promotion.

teachings.title: In God We Trust
teachings.description: Learn to trust God during financial struggles. This two-part teaching helps overcome fear and strengthens your faith in Him.

teachings.title: Is Jesus Enough
teachings.description: Discover why sin isn't an issue with God. Live free from condemnation and bask in the grace and forgiveness provided through Jesus!

teachings.title: It Begins with a Sure Foundation
teachings.description: Are you ready to experience the miraculous power of God in your life? Plant the seed of God's Word in your heart,  receive your miracle,  and shape your destiny!

teachings.title: Jesus' Farewell Address
teachings.description: Discover hope and faith in Jesus' final words to His disciples,  offering comfort and guidance during life's greatest crises.

teachings.title: Killing Sacred Cows
teachings.description: Is God really in absolute control? Traditional religious doctrines might be rendering God's Word powerless in your life. Find out the shocking truth!

teachings.title: Knowing God
teachings.description: Are you ready to revolutionize your relationship with the Lord? The greatest treasure on earth is knowing God. Find out how to live a vibrant life in Him!

teachings.title: Least of These
teachings.description: Explore why Jesus praised a thief and a master in Andrew's thought-provoking teaching series that delves into surprising biblical lessons.

teachings.title: Lessons from David
teachings.description: We all face giants in life?problems that seem insurmountable. Like David did when he battled Goliath,  learn how you,  too,  can boldly tackle life's challenges!

teachings.title: Lessons from Elijah
teachings.description: God has supernatural provision for you,  just as He did for the prophet Elijah! Discover everything you need to succeed in your place called there!""

teachings.title: Lessons from Joseph
teachings.description: Learn about Joseph's uncommon integrity,  enduring hardship,  resisting temptation,  and rising to power while trusting God's timing.

teachings.title: Lessons from the Christmas Story
teachings.description: What is Christmas all about? What's the real reason for the season? Find out in this thought-provoking free teaching!

teachings.title: Life at Conception
teachings.description: Roe v. Wade overturned in 2022! States now decide abortion laws?believers urged to boldly advocate truth amid criticism.

teachings.title: Life's Three Most Important Questions
teachings.description: Discover the three crucial questions that shape your life. Answering them correctly can determine your future and purpose.

teachings.title: Lisa Paxton's Testimony
teachings.description: Want to build your faith and receive a miracle? Testimonies do just that! Find Jesus,  your Healer,  in one woman's story of being healed from cerebral palsy.

teachings.title: Living in God's Best - Don't Settle for Less
teachings.description: What's God's part and what's our part? How do you balance grace and faith? Explore this balance and embrace a life filled with purpose and freedom!

teachings.title: Living in the Balance of Grace and Faith
teachings.description: What's God's part and what's our part? How do you balance grace and faith? Explore this balance and embrace a life filled with purpose and freedom!

teachings.title: Look Up
teachings.description: Little is much when God is in it. In Christ,  we have more than what you may realize.

teachings.title: Look Who Jesus Loves
teachings.description: God loves you! While that statement may sound bold,  it's undeniably true. Radically encounter God's life-changing and transformational love today!

teachings.title: Meditation
teachings.description: Discover the power of meditation in your relationship with God with Andrew's insightful teaching on its importance and practice.

teachings.title: More Grace More Favor
teachings.description: Discover the transformative power of humility in Andrew's teaching. Embrace God's character and unlock the blessings of a humble heart.

teachings.title: New You
teachings.description: What does it mean to be saved? There's only one way to approach God and receive the free gift of salvation. Find the only way to eternal life!

teachings.title: Observing All Things
teachings.description: Don't exclude Jesus from certain areas of your life! Let the Bible have the final say on what you believe. Find out how!

teachings.title: Our Authority Releases God's Power
teachings.description: Walk in your authority as a believer,  healing the sick and releasing God's power everywhere you go. Start living a miraculous life today!

teachings.title: Our Sabbath Rest
teachings.description: Explore the Sabbath's significance as a shadow of Jesus' work. Learn to trust in His completed work for true rest.

teachings.title: Paul's Letters to the Galatians
teachings.description: Explore Paul's bold letter to the Galatians as he confronts legalism and reaffirms the powerful truths of grace.

teachings.title: Paul's Secret's to Happiness
teachings.description: Unlink your happiness from your circumstances?just like the Apostle Paul did. Learn how to be content and joyful in every situation!

teachings.title: Paul's Thorn in the Flesh
teachings.description: Uncover the real meaning behind Paul's thorn in the flesh" as revealed in Scripture. Discover the surprising truth!"

teachings.title: Plain As Dirt
teachings.description: Transform your life by committing to God's Word. Discover insights on studying the Bible and planting His Word in your heart.

teachings.title: Positive Ministry of the Holy Spirit
teachings.description: God has designed you to live a life full of confidence and grace. Remove any traces of guilt and unworthiness from your faith walk in this free teaching!

teachings.title: Power of a Testimony
teachings.description: Testimonies can elevate your faith to receive from God! Discover how God is the answer to all your problems through these encouraging testimonies.

teachings.title: Power of Faith-Filled Words
teachings.description: If you change your words,  you'll change your life. Learn to speak from your God-given authority in Christ and experience more miracles today!

teachings.title: Power of Hope
teachings.description: Your faith needs hope to work. Learn how you can use hope and your imagination to receive all God's promises!

teachings.title: Praise and Thanksgiving or Fear and Worry?You Choose
teachings.description: Don't be afraid; God is bigger than anything that could ever come your way. Jump into thanksgiving and praise and remove all the lies of fear from your heart!

teachings.title: Prosperity Nuggets
teachings.description: Understand God's purpose for prosperity: to establish His covenant on earth through His people.

teachings.title: Proverbs
teachings.description: Unlock timeless wisdom with Andrew's verse-by-verse teaching on Proverbs. Choose wisdom and follow God for a blessed life.

teachings.title: Psalm 119 in Twenty-Two Days
teachings.description: Discover the life-changing power of Psalm 119 in just twenty-two days. Dive deep into God's Word,  renew your heart,  and experience true victory through Scripture.

teachings.title: Psychology vs. Christianity
teachings.description: Psychology or Christianity? Where should you turn? Find all the life-giving answers you need when faced with life's problems!

teachings.title: Recession? No Thanks?I'm Not Participating!
teachings.description: Build your life on God's economy,  not the world's. Say goodbye to economic uncertainties and find your stability in God's unlimited provision!

teachings.title: Redemption
teachings.description: The radical truth is that sin is no longer an issue with God. Find complete forgiveness and your redemption in the precious blood of Jesus!

teachings.title: Relationship with God
teachings.description: You can know God through His Word (2 Pet. 1:19) and resist Satan's lies. Deepen your relationship with God through His Word today!

teachings.title: Revelation Knowledge
teachings.description: Freedom is found in the revelation of God's Word (John 8:31?32 and Rom. 12:1?2). Learn how to receive revelation knowledge and completely transform your life!

teachings.title: Romans
teachings.description: Do you want a closer relationship with God? Discover God's endless love for you and what the true Gospel of grace really is!

teachings.title: Romans Highlights
teachings.description: Uncover the Gospel truth in Romans: righteousness by grace,  not works. Break free from religion and step into the freedom Christ paid for.

teachings.title: Seven Steps to Victory
teachings.description: Discover seven biblical steps to fulfill God's calling in your life. Andrew guides you from uncertainty to purpose with confidence.

teachings.title: Sharper Than a Two-Edged Sword
teachings.description: Do you want to grow in the Lord with a revelation of Him through His Word? Uncover God as your Healer with the powerful testimony of Hannah Terradez!

teachings.title: Source of All Grief
teachings.description: Shift your focus and break free from the root cause of all grief today!

teachings.title: Sovereignty of God
teachings.description: Is God truly responsible for everything in your life? He is often blamed for evil things He didn't do. Find out the surprising truth about God's true nature!

teachings.title: Sowers and Eaters
teachings.description: Are you sowing seeds or consuming them? Discover the power in thinking like a sower and not an eater!

teachings.title: Sowers Sow the Word
teachings.description: Unlock the key to all parables with the sower's story. Discover why your life may lack fruit and how to change it.

teachings.title: Spirit,  Soul and Body
teachings.description: What happened when you became a born-again believer? Find out your real identity in Christ and live a life of total victory today!

teachings.title: Spiritual Authority
teachings.description: As a born-again child of God,  you don't have to live life afraid of the devil. Find out how to use your spiritual authority,  like Tori did!

teachings.title: Staying Full of God
teachings.description: Do you want to stay in a place of constant fellowship with the Lord? Discover the four keys to staying on fire in your relationship with God!

teachings.title: Staying Positive in a Negative World
teachings.description: How do you stay positive in a negative world? Learn the secrets to staying encouraged despite the darkness!

teachings.title: Systemically Anti-Racist
teachings.description: Andrew Wommack and David & Tim Barton debunk systemic racism claims,  exploring America's history and pursuit of freedom for all.

teachings.title: Taking the Limits off God
teachings.description: Can God be limited? Andrew answers this important question in this teaching series.

teachings.title: Ten Godly Leadership Essentials
teachings.description: Andrew Wommack guides leaders to strengthen their faith,  manage conflict,  and ignite God's vision for success and impactful witness.

teachings.title: The Battle for America's Soul: The Church's Historical Role in Politics
teachings.description: Why is there a push to silence Christian voices when it comes to politics? Find out how your influence is being undermined and why your involvement is critical for shaping the future.

teachings.title: The Fear of the Lord
teachings.description: What's the difference between being afraid and having a holy fear of God? Discover the difference and be equipped to stand against evil!

teachings.title: The Fruit of Discipleship
teachings.description: Discover how present-day disciples of the Lord are bringing forth fruit throughout the world.

teachings.title: The Gospel of Peace
teachings.description: Discover the true meaning of peace proclaimed at Jesus' birth. Andrew explains why conflicts persist and the nature of divine peace.

teachings.title: The Gospel: The Power of God
teachings.description: The Gospel is the most basic,  foundational message of the New Testament,  yet it's the most misunderstood.

teachings.title: The Grace in Giving
teachings.description: Discover how grace impacts giving. Andrew's teaching shifts your perspective from performance to a biblical understanding of grace.

teachings.title: The Importance of the Holy Spirit
teachings.description: Many Christians view faith merely as a way to escape hell,  but the Holy Spirit promises radical transformation and victory here and now.

teachings.title: The Miracle of Christmas: Reflections with the Murens
teachings.description: Discover the heart of Christmas in this inspiring interview with Robert and Elizabeth Muren. Reflect on the miracle of Jesus' humble arrival,  the transformative power of creative ministry,  and the timeless message of God's love and grace for all.

teachings.title: The New You and the Holy Spirit
teachings.description: Learn what the Bible has to say about the Holy Spirit's role in your life. This is crucial to a successful walk with God.

teachings.title: The Old Man Is Dead
teachings.description: Discover freedom in Christ: Understand Paul's teachings on our old self,  embrace transformation,  and live a victorious life.

teachings.title: The Parable of the Unjust Steward
teachings.description: Explore the surprising lessons from Jesus' parable about money and stewardship. Discover the deeper truths behind the master's commendation.

teachings.title: The Power of a Gift
teachings.description: A gift can open up doors for you and provide blessings to you.

teachings.title: The Power of Imagination
teachings.description: If you worry 24/7,  you're using your imagination in a negative way. Turn everything around in your life for the better with a positive imagination of hope!

teachings.title: The Power of Partnership
teachings.description: Did you know there is power in partnership? Learn how to put that power to work for you and receive abundance and blessings in your life!

teachings.title: The Power of the Cross
teachings.description: Transform your understanding of the cross. Discover the deeper significance of Jesus' sacrifice beyond just avoiding hell in this teaching.

teachings.title: The Present Day Ministry of the Holy Spirit
teachings.description: Discover the true role of the Holy Spirit in your life. This teaching reveals His power,  gifts,  and essential support for believers.

teachings.title: The Reality of Faith
teachings.description: Though you can't touch it,  faith is real. Are you ready to experience the reality of faith and watch unseen miracles become visible in your life? Find out how!

teachings.title: The Resurrection Changes Everything (2023)
teachings.description: Explore the resurrection's power in Christianity. Andrew's teaching reveals your authority in Christ through the truth of the empty tomb.

teachings.title: The Sky is Not Falling
teachings.description: Are those fear-mongering headlines reflecting reality? Discover the truth behind the headlines and start trusting in God's provision!

teachings.title: The True Gospel
teachings.description: Explore how the Gospel shifts focus from sin to a deeper understanding of grace and true Christian living.

teachings.title: The True Nature of God
teachings.description: Is God the harsh God of the Old Testament or the loving and merciful One of the New Testament? Uncover who God really is in this free teaching!

teachings.title: The War is Over
teachings.description: God's love put an end to the conflict between God and humanity! Discover the truth that has reshaped history.

teachings.title: The Word Became Flesh
teachings.description: Why did Jesus come as the God-man to redeem us? Discover why and unlock the power of speaking God's Word as a born-again believer!

teachings.title: The Word is the Seed
teachings.description: Discover the key to understanding Jesus' parables through the parable of the sower. Learn how God's Word transforms lives.

teachings.title: Twenty Revelations That Will Change Your Life
teachings.description: Discover life-changing biblical wisdom with Andrew Wommack's mentorship on faith,  finances,  peace,  and discipleship in 'Twenty Revelations' teaching!

teachings.title: Walking by Faith
teachings.description: Feelings or faith? Even when your feelings are in turmoil,  you can walk by faith and not by sight. Find your victory in faith and not emotions!

teachings.title: Welcome to Your Place Called There
teachings.description: Learn how bold faith and obedience lead to God's provision at the 'place called there, ' where His plan and purpose unfold.

teachings.title: What is a Christian
teachings.description: What's the difference between religion and true Christianity? Discover real salvation in Jesus Christ and what a genuine relationship with God looks like!

teachings.title: What Is True Christianity
teachings.description: Ever wondered what true Christianity really is? It's time to peel back the layers,  debunk common myths,  and discover how you can embrace a life transformed by grace and faith.

teachings.title: What is Truth?
teachings.description: Learn to build your life on God's truth with Andrew's teaching,  'What Is Truth?' and discover the path to true freedom.

teachings.title: What Pleases God
teachings.description: Is pleasing God about faith or performance? Human effort will always fall short of God's perfection. Find grace,  acceptance,  and blessings solely in Christ Jesus!

teachings.title: What to Do When Your Prayers Seem Unanswered
teachings.description: What's the real reason behind seemingly unanswered prayers? Delay doesn't mean denial. Discover the connection between God's timing and your faith!

teachings.title: What's In Your Hand?
teachings.description: Discover the power of faith in Elisha's story. Learn to focus on what you have and prepare for God's multiplication.

teachings.title: Where Did I Come From?
teachings.description: Find out the answers to some of life's biggest questions: Where did I come from? Who am I? And where am I going?

teachings.title: Where Do We Go From Here?
teachings.description: Andrew Wommack addresses America's moral crisis and global lessons from the 2020 elections,  urging biblical influence and responsibility.

teachings.title: Who God Is And Who We Are
teachings.description: Is God really like that? Discover the common misconceptions about God's nature that might be holding you back.

teachings.title: Who Made Satan?
teachings.description: Examine the startling evidence for who really made Satan and the authority you have over him as a born-again believer!

teachings.title: Who Told You That You Were Naked?
teachings.description: Overcome fear and guilt with Andrew's teaching on conscience. Discover truths for freedom and live a simpler,  victorious life.

teachings.title: Who You Are in the Spirit
teachings.description: Understand your true identity as a new creation in Christ and be empowered to live a life of absolute victory and freedom!

teachings.title: Whose Righteousness?
teachings.description: Discover the true meaning of righteousness and why it's vital for your relationship with God!

teachings.title: Why,  When,  and Where to Give
teachings.description: Why,  when,  and where should you give? Uncover what the Bible has to say about finances,  giving,  and being a godly steward of your resources!

teachings.title: You've Already Got It!
teachings.description: Discover the powerful truth: God has already provided healing,  prosperity,  and blessings. You don't need to beg; just believe. Find out how!

teachings.title: Your Identity in Christ
teachings.description: Resolve Christian identity crises by understanding your true self in Christ. Andrew's teaching offers clarity and transformation.
